Body.Content:
We are announcing a new feature in Public Preview where we are enhancing the filtering experience for DLP alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender portal with the capability to filter the DLP alerts/incidents queues by File Name or File Path.

This message is associated with Microsoft 365 Roadmap ID 180989

[When this will happen:]

This is now available in Preview.

[How this will affect your organization:]

  • The filtering experience is now enhanced with the capability to filter the Alerts/ Incidents queue by File Name or File Path.
  • Simply type the File Name or File Path in the Entities filter and select from the suggestions.
  • After applying the filter, the Alerts/ Incidents queue will show all related Incidents and alerts with the file(s).

Below is a screenshot of this new File Name/File Path filter in action.


[What you need to do to prepare:]

There is nothing you need to do prepare, the filter option will be available in the DLP incidents and alerts experience in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal.

Investigate data loss alerts with Microsoft 365 Defender | Microsoft Learn

Title: Data Loss Prevention - File Name and File Path filters for DLP alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender portal
